item.title: How do I make two quest menu things?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

On one of the methods change

public void ServerHelp() {

to something like

public void Menu2() {

Then when it calls the method, instead of

ServerHelp();

change it to

Menu2();

Remember you only are doing this to ONE of them.

item.title: How do I make two quest menu things?
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

The title makes it sound confusing

But Itâ€™s notâ€¦

I thinkâ€¦

Anyway, I have this one commands called ::godwarsinfo.

and it opens up a quest menu with my words in it.

hereâ€™s mah code:

public void ServerHelp() { sendFrame126("@dgr@ God Wars Info", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("@dbl@Welcome to @cya@Project-Chizle!", 8146); sendFrame126("@dbl@100% Made by Fanz", 8147); sendFrame126("@dre@ @dbl@", 8148); sendFrame126("@dgr@Drops:", 8149); sendFrame126("@whi@Pharos Scepter: @whi@Low leveled GW monsters.",8150); sendFrame126("@whi@Enchanted:@whi@Low Leveled GW monsters.",8151); sendFrame126("@whi@Enchanted Gem teles you to the bosses ",8152); sendFrame126("@whi@ Dragon Boots: Saradomin Wizards.",8153); sendFrame126("@whi@Zammy robes: Zammy battle mages", 8154); sendFrame126("@whi@Amulet of Str: Armadyl Guardian dudes.",8155); sendFrame126("@whi@.",8156); sendFrame126("@whi@All of the GodSwords and Bandos armor:", 8157); sendFrame126("@whi@The GodWars Dungeon boss...", 8158); sendFrame126("", 8164); sendFrame126("", 8165); sendFrame126("", 8166); sendFrame126("", 8167); sendFrame126("", 8168); sendFrame126("", 8169); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }

Now, I also want to make another one of those called ::help, which will tell open another quest menu with my help thingy.

Hereâ€™s my code:

public void ServerHelp() { sendFrame126("@dre@--- - Help Menu", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("Welcome to the @dbl@HELP MENU", 8145); sendFrame126("Created By @dbl@---", 8146); sendFrame126("@lre@--LEVELING--", 8147); sendFrame126("@dbl@Type ::train to train!", 8148); sendFrame126("@dbl@There are monsters all over Karamaja!", 8149); sendFrame126("@lre@--MONEY--", 8150); sendFrame126("@dbl@Kill monsters and thieving", 8151); sendFrame126("Best $ dropper:", 8152); sendFrame126("@dbl@Bats, Cave goblins", 8153); sendFrame126("@lre@--STAFF--", 8154); sendFrame126("@whi@Getting Mod:", 8155); sendFrame126("@dbl@Help new players, Be active on the server,", 8156); sendFrame126("@dbl@for at least 3 days, and help solve problems", 8157); sendFrame126("@whi@Getting Admin:", 8158); sendFrame126("@dbl@Help new players, Be active on the server ", 8159); sendFrame126("@dbl@for at least 6 days, Help solve major problems,", 8160); sendFrame126("@dbl@And give advice", 8161); sendFrame126("@whi@Getting Co-Owner:", 8162); sendFrame126("@dbl@Help new players, Be active on the server", 8163); sendFrame126("@dbl@For at least 9 days,", 8164); sendFrame126("@dbl@Help solve extreme problems, give advice,", 8165); sendFrame126("@dbl@Know how to code, and @whi@HOST!!", 8166); sendFrame126("Have a good time!", 8167); sendFrame126("", 8168); sendFrame126("@whi@Latest update:", 8169); sendFrame126("@gre@Gave goblins money, added a shop to sell seeds,", 8170); sendFrame126("@gre@And made it easier to train thieving", 8171); sendFrame126("", 8172); sendFrame126("", 8173); sendFrame126("", 8174); sendFrame126("", 8175); sendFrame126("", 8176); sendFrame126("", 8177); sendFrame126("", 8178); sendFrame126("", 8179); sendFrame126("", 8180); sendFrame126("", 8181); sendFrame126("", 8182); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }

I dont know how I can add them both to my server.

If someone could point out what i have to change on my second code, that would be great!

And if you need this:

Iâ€™m using Devolution 7.0

Thanks guys!

~
Me
~

[sub]Probably about to get bannedâ€¦[/sub]
